text: Despite they are busy preparing for a huge takeaway order, they still take my order promptly. I like it how they make an effort to remove the fish skin, the fish is fresh and the generous amount of batang fish for the smallest portion. Even there are quite a few stall selling fish soup in this estate, this is still very much my preferred one. üëçüëçüëçüòã

There are plenty of fish soup stalls around,another one here worth mentioning in the aljunied area.Simple but yet so delicious clear broth ,you the option of adding,bee Hoon(thin),white rice, porridge,mee sua as your carbohydrates.Prices start fr $6-$10 for fish head soup.The fish are sliced thicker to give full bite,shiok!

Aljunied area has a few good fish soup stall, hence when we chanced upon this fish soup, we are happy to find that this is on par with the rest!

The fish slices were thick and firm, and has NO SKIN, which we liked ‚ò∫Ô∏è
Smallest portion cost $6 but fish slices was generous.
Soup was clear, light but still tasty, with a hint of sole fish in the broth. Each portion came with a slice of the ti po as well.

Recommend to give this a try if you are in the area.
We will definitely be back.
Very good fish soup, fish is fresh with good broth. Must try!

First time here, generous portion and very fresh fish

Second visit on14 april 2023
Worth 15 mins walk from my placeü§≠
The fish is very generous for 6$
